tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_progress (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    progress_status ENUM('Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Completed'),
    completion_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Development_Goal (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    goal_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    goal_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE goal_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  update_description TEXT,
  update_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_goals(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE goals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    description VARCHAR,
    employee_id INT,
    deadline DATE,
    progress DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
    department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    manager_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE progress_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT,
    tracking_date DATE,
    notes TEXT
)
